response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value of $15,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value, making it an attractive opportunity for you. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can discuss the details further.", "product_price": 12000}
